module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Moduł HiPay umożliwia obsługę transakcji online bez konieczności zawierania umowy z agentem rozliczeniowym i posiada system ochrony przed oszustwami. Moduł zapewnia dostęp do wszelkich krajowych i międzynarodowych form płatności (Visa, Mastercard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: skrill
module.description: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrz
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrzymywania pieniędzy w niemal 200 krajach i 40 walutach.
module.additional_description: Bezpłatna i szybka konfiguracjaDostęp do ponad 100 lokalnych rozwiązań płatniczych w ramach 1 łatwej integracjiŁączność z ponad 30 milionami posiadaczy rachunku SkrillNajwyższe standardy bezpieczeństwa i technologia zapobiegająca nadużyciom finansowymPłynny sposób realizacji płatności za pomocą telefonu komórkowego, tabletu i komputera

module.name: paypal
module.description: Jako lider płatności online PayPal oferuje bardzo wiele prostych w użyciu, elastycznych i bezpiecznych rozwiązań cieszących się zaufaniem ponad 220 milionów użytkowników
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Jako lider płatności online PayPal oferuje bardzo wiele prostych w użyciu, elastycznych i bezpiecznych rozwiązań cieszących się zaufaniem ponad 220 milionów użytkowników. Dzięki temu modułowi możesz korzystać z naszej kompleksowej platformy do przetwarzania płatności i rozwijać swoją krajową i międzynarodową działalność handlową w Internecie oraz na urządzeniach mobilnych.
module.additional_description: Łatwa aktywacja: Z systemem PayPal możesz niemal natychmiast zacząć odbierać płatności bez żadnych opłat za uruchomienie usługi! Nasze zoptymalizowane rozwiązania mobilne pozwolą Ci zwiększyć współczynnik konwersji nawet do 87,5%* i nie wymagają dodatkowej integracji. A dzięki funkcji One Touch™ kupujący mogą płacić za zakupy jeszcze szybciej niż dotychczas! Program ochrony sprzedających: Chroń swoje dochody przed internetowymi oszustwami, korzystając z ochrony sprzedających w systemie PayPal. Ochronie tej mogą podlegać zarówno artykuły materialne, jak i niematerialne, a także większość usług. Przejrzyste zasady dotyczące opłat gwarantują, że nie spotkają Cię żadne niespodzianki. Brak ukrytych opłat.  Prowizja jest naliczana tylko podczas odbierania płatności. Im więcej płatności otrzymujesz, tym mniej Cię to kosztuje. * Współczynnik konwersji z użyciem funkcji One Touch™ obliczono w IV kwartale 2015 r. w ramach badania comScore. Próba użytkowników ze Stanów Zjednoczonych.

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.description: Check out our new Boxtal Connect plugin: Boxtal Connect
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Check out our new Boxtal Connect plugin: Boxtal Connect
module.additional_description: 1. IMPROVE YOUR CONVERSION RATESGive a choice between different shipping options which suit best your clients : pick up stations (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, etc.), standard (Colissimo, Happy-Post, etc.), express (Chronopost, FedEx, DHL Express, UPS, TNT Express, etc.). 2. REDUCE YOUR SHIPPING COSTSSave up to 75% on your shipping costs with the best shipping services without commitments or any contracts. 3. SAVE TIME ON MANAGING YOUR SHIPMENTSPrint shipping labels directly from your PrestaShop back-office. Track, cancel or reschedule your orders in one place. One single invoice for all shipping services. 4. ACCELERATE YOUR WEBSITE LAUNCH One single plugin to manage all your shipments. Boxtal is your only contact before, during and after delivery, whatever carriers were selected. Save time and focus on the essential of your business.

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Direct payment via online banking. Easy, quick and secure – without registration
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Direct payment via online banking. Easy, quick and secure – without registration. Automatic data transfer and the real-time transaction notification enable a smooth payment process and a faster delivery.
module.additional_description: Attractive- Cost savings through low fees- Credited funds are irreversible- Low default risk- Low storage costs thanks to short processing times Easy- Automated and transparent processes- Easy integration thanks to more than 100 plug-ins for standardized shop systems as well as an efficient API for individual shop systems- Convenient for your customers as they can use their online banking details- No eWallet and thus no registration required for your customers Fast- Funds are transferred directly from customer’s online banking account to your bank account- Real-time transaction notification after the transfer has been listed- All within one process - faster than advanced payment (by bank transfer)- Fast cash flow, high liquidity Secure- Data is transferred in an encrypted form via secured connections- Payment system certified by TÜV Saarland with a certified data protection (TÜV Saarland is a German, state-approved monitoring body for the inspection and maintenance of security standards)- Data processing center in Germany in accordance with strict banking standards

module.name: bluesnap
module.description: BlueSnap is an all-in-one payment solution, providing both a merchant account and payment gateway designed to accelerate commerce for merchants selling globally
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BlueSnap is an all-in-one payment solution, providing both a merchant account and payment gateway designed to accelerate commerce for merchants selling globally.   By connecting your PrestaShop store with BlueSnap, you can accept payments securely from shoppers anywhere in the world in their local currency. BlueSnap provides analytics and reporting to make it easy to identify opportunities for higher conversions. In addition, PrestaShop merchants process credit and debit card transactions with a secure checkout form, which is displayed directly on your checkout page so shoppers never leave your store.
module.additional_description: All-in one payment solution:Combined merchant account and payment gateway for fast & easy on-boardingAbility to board merchants globallyNo long-term contracts or setup fees, and the most competitive transaction fees in the industryHigher payment conversionsMinimized PCI Scope

module.name: paypalmx

module.description_full: PayPal es la forma más fácil, rápida y segura de enviar y recibir pagos en línea. Es uno de los principales impulsores del comercio electrónico en México.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

module.name: dotpay
module.description: Dotpay umożliwia szybkie i wygodne przyjmowanie płatności internetowych dla sprzedających w e-sklepie na bazie oprogramowania PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Dotpay umożliwia szybkie i wygodne przyjmowanie płatności internetowych dla sprzedających w e-sklepie na bazie oprogramowania PrestaShop. Załóż swoje konto i przekonaj się, ile zyskasz, płacąc online z Dotpay!
module.additional_description: Współpraca Dotpay z PrestaShop jest odpowiedzią na zapotrzebowanie sprzedawców, którzy, minimalizując nakłady, chcą zwiększyć swoje możliwości sprzedażowe. Możliwości oferowane przez PrestaShop nie ograniczają się jedynie do podstawowych funkcji sklepu internetowego. Obejmują również wszechstronne możliwości budowania oferty oraz analizowania sprzedaży, stosowanie systemu banerów i komentarzy, obsługę kanałów RSS czy porównywanie produktów. Przydatną funkcjonalnością jest możliwość tworzenia indywidualnych szablonów graficznych, zmieniając w ten sposób domyślny wygląd e-sklepu. Co więcej, oprogramowanie można łatwo rozszerzać za pomocą dodatkowych modułów zewnętrznych.

module.name: prestashippingeasy
module.description: ShippingEasy is the ultimate PrestaShop shipping app for businesses of all sizes. Save time and money on your shipping so you can focus on what's important—building your business
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ShippingEasy is the ultimate PrestaShop shipping app for businesses of all sizes. Save time and money on your shipping so you can focus on what's important—building your business.
module.additional_description: PrestaShop + ShippingEasy: Simplify shipping and save money while doing it Sync all your orders in one locationSave up to 46% with the best USPS ratesEasy carrier integration with USPS, UPS and FedExFREE starter plan for up to 50 shipments per monthExceptional customer support Prestashop syncs automatically with ShippingEasy, downloading all your order details in minutes and helping you assign shipping preferences, rates and delivery options in real-time. No cut and paste. No manual updates. Grow orders placed on your website and marketplaces, including eBay, Amazon, Sears, Walmart, Newegg, and many more with Customer Marketing and Inventory Management add-ons.

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment. Mercado Pago provide the highest security standard with PCI Level 1 certification and an internal robust fraud analysis.
module.additional_description: Mercado Pago can help Prestashop’s merchants increase their sales with its cutting edge payment technology, providing solutions that fit with the clients’ needs:  - Online and real-time payment processing- High approval rate through an internal robust fraud analyses - High conversion with our customized checkout- Customizable bar code payment - Potential new consumers due to our large user base – 120 million in Latin America- Highest Level 1 PCI certification- Major credit card brands acceptance- Payment in installments- Two-day or fourteen day funding*- Omni-channel payment system for website and mobiles- One-click to pay with MercadoPago’s standard checkout- Sellers protection program*- Easy to install module  * According to MercadoPago’s terms and conditions.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Połącz Twój PrestaShop z wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi, jak eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister czy CDiscount
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Połącz Twój PrestaShop z wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi, jak eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister czy CDiscount.
module.additional_description: Optymizuje widoczność Twoich produktów na platformach handlowychSprzedawaj więcej niż kiedykolwiek dotąd: 78% zakupów w internecie odbywa się na wielkich platformach, jak Amazon czy eBay. To właśnie są najważniejsze kanały sprzedaży, które dramatycznie poprawią Twoje możliwości zbytu. magnalister zrobi z Twojego PrestaShop centralę zarządzania, z której możesz wygodnie sterować inwentarzem i zamówieniami na wszystkich podłączonych platformach sprzedażowych.magnalister to idealne połączenie pomiędzy sklepem PrestaShop a wielkimi platformami sprzedażowymi. 4 centralne procesy dbają o optymalne zarządzanie sprzedażą:Wystawianie produktów wprost z PrestaShop (z użyciem opisu, grafik, innych danych jak marka, kolor czy kod EAN, zapisanych w sklepie PrestaShop) na platformy sprzedażowe,Import zamówień z platform do panelu zamówień sklepu PrestaShop,Synchronizacja stanów magazynu i cen ze sklepu PrestaShop na platformy sprzedażowe,Synchronizacja statusu zamówień ("Wysłane") ze sklepu PrestaShop na platformy sprzedażowe. Dodatkowe funkcje, jak zarządzanie wariacjami produktów, czy elastyczna konfiguracja cen dla każdej platformy czynią sprzedaż multikanałową czystą przyjemnością.Pierwsze 30 dni gratis! Po zarejestrowaniu w serwisie otrzymasz klucz aktywacyjny (PassPhrase), którym możesz aktywować moduł. Przez pierwsze 30 dni nie pobieramy żadnych opłat. Po upływie tego okresu magnalister kosztuje (łącznie z wsparciem) od 29,- EUR miesięcznie (+VAT).

module.additional_description: Managing your e-commerce site has never been so simple. Brainify Free Dashboard focuses on the key elements of the online sale cycle and summarises this strategic data in the form of an array of dashboards.  At each key step in your selling cycle you will be guided by a beautifully designed dashboard, summarising the essential data. 1.     Acquisition2.     Sales3.     Products4.     Costumers5.     Cross sell Don’t miss an important event and gain time by leaving Brainify to summarise the most important elements of your commercial strategy.Don’t let the secrets of your data pass you by damaging your daily turnover. Receive suggestions of performance enhancing tools to improve your performance. Take control of your e-business and join the e commerce republic thanks to free e-commerce analytics.The magic is in your data, it becomes a toy to help you to act more quickly by enabling a simple and efficient understanding.

module.name: alipay
module.description: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions. It is a secure and convenient solution and preferred by over 400 million active members.
module.additional_description: What is Alipay? Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading third-party online payment solution for China. The significantly growing interest by Chinese shoppers in Western brands create large opportunities for Western companies with 67% of Chinese luxury spending occurring outside Chinese borders. If you are offering maternity products, food supplements, fashion, beauty or jewellery, Alipay will create an astonishing opportunity for you, opening up the Chinese market.

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do.
module.additional_description: Try a free live chat with visitor recording Smartsupp is a combination of live chat and visitor recording, making it the only tool you’ll need to get to understand your visitors. With Smartsupp you can chat with visitors in real-time and also watch their behavior on your website. Know everything about your visitors The Smartsupp plugin lets you identify details of your visitors, like their name, email, or other categories you deem important. You can see all these details while chatting with that visitor so that you know who you’re chatting with (e.g., Tom Smith, who already spent $800 on your website). The visitor has to be signed in on your website for you to be able to see the info. Chat with your visitors in real time Smartsupp allows you to help your visitors as soon as they need assistance. You’re able to answer their questions instantly in the on-site chat box. If you notice similar situations arising, create and use canned replies and automatic messages to save time. With this fully customizable, multi-language live chat, you can increase your sales up to five times. Record the screens of your visitors Watch video recordings of any visitor on your website in the Smartsupp dashboard. You’ll see their screen, mouse movements, and clicks — great for understanding the behavior of your customers. The powerful combination of live chat and visitor recordings lets you know customers’ needs even before they make a final decision. Smartsupp helps you keep them on the right track.

module.author: Patworx Multimedia

module.additional_description: Amazon Pay can help you to:Build customer loyaltyAcquire new customersIncrease conversionReduce fraudOptimize the mobile checkout experience Sign-up now for Amazon Pay!

module.name: becommerce
module.description: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites. Thanks to its trustmark, BeCommerce contributes to the growth of the sector.
module.additional_description: 1. Confidence and the BeCommerce TrustmarkConsumer trust is crucial and our Trustmark contributes to the increasement of the trust level in e-commerce. In order to use our Trustmark, the webshop has to go through a certification process performed by an independent audit office, Bureau Veritas. Bureau Veritas checks your webshop on about 40 points. Once the certification has been successfully completed, it can carry both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks. We have also negotiated an advantageous price for our members for a rating and review system for your consumers. In addition, BeCommerce also provides twice a year a free penetration test of the webshop urls, so you remain protected against hacking and phishing. Both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks generate extra trust and can yield more conversions and therefore extra revenues. 2. Research and DataWe provide our members regularly with relevant facts and figures. The BeCommerce Market Monitor gives some insights in consumer spendings on e-commerce in Belgium.  This study of about 70 pages clearly shows the trends and evolutions in Belgian e-commerce, and this on a quarterly basis. You can see who is buying online, how are they buying online, the different analyses by sector, the different payment methods, etc. In addition to the BeCommerce Market Monitor, BeCommerce also publishes the BeCommerce Shopping100, which is a top 100 of the webshops where Belgian consumers most often shop online, including a top 25 cross-border webshops. 3. Networking EventsEvery year we organize several recurring events on topics such as Logistics, Mobile and Cross-Border.  Various companies share their business cases, CEO’s debate some hot topics, and the attendees can discuss this during the network moments in between. The BeCommerce Awards are our yearly competition where various outstanding webshops can obtain prestigious prizes: it gathers the most important e-commerce players in the Belgian market. 4. Dispute ResolutionWe provide an independent ADR-mechanism for e-commerce consumers in Belgium, whereby we refer complaints to the webshop in question or to the ombudsman competent in the issue concerned. 5. Regulatory and Governmental AffairsWe offer our members legal support and keep them up-to-date on new developments in e-commerce.  Together with Ecommerce Europe, we defend the interests of e-commerce at both the European, national and regional levels. Ecommerce Europe is constantly monitoring the European Commission and can always influence new proposals that could affect e-commerce.

module.name: satispay
module.description: Satispay is a new mobile payment system that allows users to pay in physical and online stores, send money to friends, all within a few simple clicks
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Satispay is a new mobile payment system that allows users to pay in physical and online stores, send money to friends, all within a few simple clicks.
module.additional_description: Satispay is a new mobile payment system that allows users to pay in physical and online stores, send money to friends, as well as top up phone credit; all within a few simple clicks. The app for consumers is intuitive, secure and available for Android, iOS and Windows Phone.  Satispay is not only fast but it also allows you to reduce the cost and increase the security of accepting digital payments making it the ideal solution for businesses. Customers make purchases by simply inserting their IBAN number and confirming the payment request from their smartphone. The simplified process reduces the barriers for consumers resulting in fewer abandoned carts at checkout. In order to activate the service, you must complete the free signup for Satispay Business via the following link: https://business.satispay.com/signup. Joining Satispay is free as there are no activation costs, monthly fees, or deactivation charges.  The only fee is a commission of:0.5% on payments less than or equal to 10€0.5% + 0.20€ for payments greater than 10€ For more information, visit our pricing page: https://www.satispay.com/en/pricing.

module.name: chargeback
module.description: Issuer alerts, compelling responses and real-time dispute resolution – in one tool. NOT a fraud filter, this is automated dispute management and revenue recovery. Works with Stripe, PayPal, Authorize
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Issuer alerts, compelling responses and real-time dispute resolution – in one tool. NOT a fraud filter, this is automated dispute management and revenue recovery. Works with Stripe, PayPal, Authorize.net, First Data, WorldPay, Braintree and more.
module.additional_description: Chargeback is a Utah-based software company that automates post-transaction fraud and dispute management. We know your goal is to maximize revenue, that's why we created the Chargeback App. This dispute management tool picks up the ball where fraud scoring and manual reviews fall short, enabling you to efficiently minimize lost revenue and increase profit. Level-up your teamChargeback is the only dispute management platform designed to empower your team, not replace it.Identifying and gathering the data required to respond to a single dispute often requires logging into three separate systems: your storefront, payment gateway and merchant account processor. By consolidating the data from each, the Chargeback App helps you stop disputes in real-time and craft detailed response documents that adhere to the chargeback rebuttal rules set by Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover. The Chargeback App provides expert guidance and support at every stage of the dispute lifecycle to protect your revenue. Consolidate all your PrestShop, payment gateway and merchant account data into a single platformQuickly respond to disputes with a full understanding of the order's status and dispute stageImprove dispute management and minimize lost revenue with expert support and guidance Intercept disputes, take actionChargeback Alerts are enhanced notifications that allow you to take powerful actions like instant gift card deactivation, cancel recurring billing, and services suspension. Allowing you to prevent fulfillment of goods and services for which you won't receive payment. Generate fast, accurate, and compelling responsesThe Chargeback App equips you with a first-of-its-kind response generator. Order, customer, transaction, and dispute data is auto-populated into responses based on current card network rules and regulations. Wave goodbye to tedious data pulling and copy+paste nightmares. The Chargeback App quickly identifies and aggregates your data so you can respond to alerts and disputes immediately. Order, transaction, alert and dispute data is aggregated into a single record.Guided workflows help you add required and optional evidence blocks.A multipage PDF and DOCx is generated and sent back to the issuer.

module.name: feedbiz
module.description: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.author: Common-Services
module.description_full: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.additional_description: You configure once and then magic occurs ; everything becomes automatic ! This means that you no longer need to connect to multiple back-offices, you manage everything from Prestashop. Cdiscount Flux is a cloud-based, self-contained solution that enables you to automate the management of catalog, orders, order tracking. You no longer have to worry about inventory updates, new product creations, Cdiscount Flux automatically manages feeds to and from Cdiscount marketplace. Cdiscount Flux automatically imports your orders into Prestashop, updates quantities, prices, manages repricing, invoice sendings and many other features. Cdiscount Flux is not a feed integrator or aggregator but a cloud solution that allows you to manage your own feeds. You boost your sales thanks to the traffic and sales generated by Cdiscount and Cdiscount Flux automatically manages the entire sales process and listing. You benefit from all features offered by Cdiscount, free 4 times payment handled by Cdiscount, multiple delivery methods (home delivery and collection point), repricing (price adjustment) and more.The support is reactive and free, 5 agents are permanently at your disposal to answer your questions.

module.name: ns8csp
module.description: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Reduce your store’s chargebacks, increase the effectiveness of your ad campaigns, and ensure quality of your site’s user experience.
module.additional_description: NS8 Protect uses industry-leading techniques in behavioral analytics, real-time user scoring, and global monitoring to identify bots and other malicious activity in your storefront. As a platform-based approach to online threat reduction, NS8 Protect is designed to help your store fight the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Revenue Killer #1: Order FraudNS8 Protect scores every visitor to your storefront. Every action taken by the visitor leading up to and including placing an order is scored individually and reflected in the EQ8 Score. Low-scoring orders are most likely fraudulent and may be held or flagged for manual review. NS8 Protect also provides automated tools to escalate suspect orders or even request e-mail and SMS text verification from the visitor. The mix of automated tools and easier manual reviews empowers merchants to optimize their order processing and minimize risk. Benefit from the network of stores and websites already tagging fraudulent users and suspicious behavior by using NS8 software.Reduce costly chargebacks and the risk they pose to your merchant account.Reduce both the labor dedicated to manual review and shipping lead times.Set your own custom threshold for suspect orders and users. Revenue Killer #2: Advertising Fraud Advertising fraud (especially remarketing fraud) is a huge and growing issue for online merchants. NS8 Protect not only scores all traffic visiting your store, but it also detects and records the traffic’s source. You will see when, and which, advertising sources are delivering low-quality, high-risk, fraudulent traffic. You will be able to save money and increase revenue by eliminating poorly performing campaigns and focusing your budget on the successful campaigns that deliver results. Compare scored campaigns for the presence of bot traffic and fraud.Prevent bots and fraudulent users from being tagged for remarketing.Integrate with Google Analytics to tag high-value users for more effective remarketing.Track your store’s advertising savings from blocked fraudulent users. Revenue Killer #3: Poor Performance NS8 Protect includes 5 critical monitors that every PrestaShop store should have. If and when an issue arises, escalating text messages are sent to you and your staff warning of potential or actual problems. Monitor your store’s technical performance. If your store becomes slow or unresponsive due to plugin conflicts or other changes, you will be immediately notified.Monitor your store’s global performance relative to other eCommerce stores.Monitor your store’s encryption certificates. If your store’s certificate expires, users will be warned against using your service. NS8 will alert you first, before the all-important certificate expires.Monitor spam and malware blacklists for your store’s domain. If your store finds itself listed, maliciously or accidentally, NS8 Protect will alert you and direct you towards a solution.

module.name: viabill
module.displayName: ViaBill Official – Try, before you buy!
module.description: We’re the leading “Try, before you buy” and “Pay later” payment solution throughout the world
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: We’re the leading “Try, before you buy” and “Pay later” payment solution throughout the world. We’re putting the customer in focus and allow them to pay on their terms whether that’s now or later.
module.additional_description: ViaBill is a payment method empowering the eCommerce stores to compete effectively with the retail stores.Our “Try, before you buy” concept is allowing the customers to overcome the biggest barrier of online shopping – the psychical check of the product; is it the right material, the right color and/or the right size?ViaBill give the customers 30 days to receive, try and return or keep the products before capturing the money from their card – but ViaBill pays the eCommerce store right away.That means customers tends to buy and keep more lifting your AOV (Average order value) by 32.7% on average. ViaBill also helps convert snoozers to buyers by allowing them to try, before they buy!

module.name: mollie

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mollie is a payment service provider creating solutions for entrepreneurs to receive and manage their online payments. We do this by always looking one step further, aiming to disrupt the payment industry. With the robust yet simple Mollie API, retailers can offer their customers a broad variety of payment methods. All you need to do is download Mollie’s free plugin and integrate it in your Prestashop webshop.
module.additional_description: Mollie serves smaller local merchants as well as international corporations. We always look one step further, aiming to disrupt the payment industry. Don’t let borders define your business and offer multiple method payments to your clients. Focus on the most important : your company. Mollie takes care of your payments.No administrative tasks to get your business up and running with Mollie. You can create your account within a few minutes and start accepting the most used method payments in Europe.There are no hidden fees, no subscription fees, and you only pay for successful transactions.Get the expertise of a team dedicated to your needs. For more informations : https://www.mollie.com/en/

module.name: santanderpaymentsolutions
module.description: Offer your customers the most important online payment services from a single source. Santander Purchase on Account and Santander Instalment Purchase now make paying much easier
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Offer your customers the most important online payment services from a single source. Santander Purchase on Account and Santander Instalment Purchase now make paying much easier.
module.additional_description: No risk – Santander takes on the default risk at 100%. You receive your money – guaranteed. Real time saving – Santander is responsible for the collection process and thereby reduces your administrative effort. Individual settlement – you receive monthly transaction overviews, adapted to your individual needs Conversion increase – you benefit from the popularity of the product Purchase on Account, the preferred payment method for many customers. Improved liquidity for you – you receive your payments each working day without having to wait for the value date Improved liquidity for your customers – you allow more customers to finance expensive goods with the help of variable instalments and flexile durations. Increased customer loyalty – your customers appreciate the uncomplicated handling and the respectful communication at eye level. Flexible payment – Purchase on Account allows your customer to pay payment terms of up to 30 days. Instalment Purchase offers variable instalments and flexible durations ranging from 3 to 26 months.
